landing.description: Stay one step ahead with early detection of chronic kidney disease. Empowering you with insights for a healthier future.

selectLangauge.heading: Select Langauge
selectLangauge.tagline: Choose your preferred language for a better experience.

login.tagline: Predicting Kidney Health for a Better Tomorrow
login.unRegistered: Don't Have An Account? Register Now

Questionnaire1.question4: Do you have high blood pressure?

Questionnaire2.question2: Do you have a history of heart attack or stroke?
Questionnaire2.question3: Do you have a history of congestive heart failure or heart failure?
Questionnaire2.question4: Do you have circulation disease in your legs?

Questionnaire3.question1: Do you have a family history of kidney disease?
Questionnaire3.question2: Do you have protein in your urine?
Questionnaire3.question3: Do you experience foamy or bubbly urine?
Questionnaire3.question4: Do you frequently wake up at night to urinate?

Questionnaire4.question1: Do you experience frequent swelling in your legs, ankles, or feet?
Questionnaire4.question2: Do you often feel tired or have low energy levels?
Questionnaire4.question3: Do you have difficulty concentrating or experience brain fog?
Questionnaire4.question4: Have you had unexplained weight loss recently?
